description: Mecklenburg County Open Data Viewer built with Next.js project bootstrapped with create-next-app.
title: Open Data Viewer

description: Aerial viewer built using Leaflet, Svelte, and TailwindCSS.
title: Time Machine

description: A dashboard for community data and health. This site is made with Svelte, Tailwind CSS, Maplibre GL, and Vite.
title: Quality of Life Explorer

description: A dashboard for community data and health. This site is made with Svelte, Tailwind CSS, Leaflet, and Vite.
title: Community Compass

description: GeoPortal is a one stop shopping for location information government app. Created with Svelte, Tailwind CSS, MapLibre GJ JS, and Vite.
title: GeoPortal

description: Mecklenburg County open data and maps hub, built with Svelte and TailwindCSS. The development and build environment is Vite.
title: Open Mapping

description: The archive is a simple historic scans viewer, built with Leaflet, Svelte and Tailwind.
title: The Archive

description: The Dirt-Simple PostGIS HTTP API, or dirt, exposes PostGIS functionality to your applications over HTTP. Build using Fastify.
title: Dirt-Simple PostGIS HTTP API

description: Mecklenburg County made this tool to make moving spatial data into Postgres easy to script and schedule. It does that by leveraging the extraordinary ogr-fdw and other foreign data wrappers.
title: NodeJS ETL tooling for Postgres/PostGIS

description: A simple tiles server for MBTiles files. It can serve image and vector tiles, and multiple MBTiles files can be served.
title: MBTiles Server
